mapper.sql: select id, record_date, age, gender, lead_count, zcxdt_ecg, dxxl_ecg, ywxl_ecg, fxxl_ecg, sxxl_ecg, jjxxl_ecg, qbxl_ecg, sxxdgs_ecg, ssxxdgs_ecg, jjxxdgs_ecg, fxxdgs_ecg, fxyb_ecg, fxzb_ecg, fxtb_ecg, sxyb_ecg, sxzb_ecg, jjxyb_ecg, jjxzb_ecg, jjxtb_ecg, dxtb_ecg, xstb_ecg, qxtb_ecg, xfcd_ecg, xfpd_ecg, xscd_ecg, xspd_ecg, ydfszd_ecg, edfszd_ecg, edIxfszd_ecg, edIIxfszd_ecg, sdfszd_ecg, dfzd_ecg, gdfszd_ecg, zqfzzd_ecg, zhfzzd_ecg, wqxzszzd_ecg, bwqxzszzd_ecg, wqxyszzd_ecg, bwqxyszzd_ecg, ftyxsnzd_ecg, sncyxcd_ecg, xsyjb_ecg, yjzhz_ecg, zxffd_ecg, zxsfd_ecg, yxffd_ecg, yxsfd_ecg, stgb_ecg, st_tgb_ecg, tbyc_ecg, qtjqyc_ecg, qtcjqyc_ecg, kjub_ecg, zqfj_ecg, qjbxjgs_ecg, qcbxjgs_ecg, qgfbxjgs_ecg, qbxjgs_ecg, xbxjgs_ecg, xhbxjgs_ecg, hbxjgs_ecg, xcbbxjgs_ecg, gcbbxjgs_ecg, cbbxjgs_ecg, xnmxxjgs_ecg, ysxjgs_ecg, fsttgxxjgs_ecg, xjbxjgs_ecg, jbxjgs_ecg, yjx_ecg, jx_ecg, cjx_ecg, xdtwjz_ecg from ecg_count
mapper.insert:
insert into ecg_count
id, record_date, age, gender, lead_count, zcxdt_ecg, dxxl_ecg, ywxl_ecg, fxxl_ecg, sxxl_ecg, jjxxl_ecg, qbxl_ecg, sxxdgs_ecg, ssxxdgs_ecg, jjxxdgs_ecg, fxxdgs_ecg, fxyb_ecg, fxzb_ecg, fxtb_ecg, sxyb_ecg, sxzb_ecg, jjxyb_ecg, jjxzb_ecg, jjxtb_ecg, dxtb_ecg, xstb_ecg, qxtb_ecg, xfcd_ecg, xfpd_ecg, xscd_ecg, xspd_ecg, ydfszd_ecg, edfszd_ecg, edIxfszd_ecg, edIIxfszd_ecg, sdfszd_ecg, dfzd_ecg, gdfszd_ecg, zqfzzd_ecg, zhfzzd_ecg, wqxzszzd_ecg, bwqxzszzd_ecg, wqxyszzd_ecg, bwqxyszzd_ecg, ftyxsnzd_ecg, sncyxcd_ecg, xsyjb_ecg, yjzhz_ecg, zxffd_ecg, zxsfd_ecg, yxffd_ecg, yxsfd_ecg, stgb_ecg, st_tgb_ecg, tbyc_ecg, qtjqyc_ecg, qtcjqyc_ecg, kjub_ecg, zqfj_ecg, qjbxjgs_ecg, qcbxjgs_ecg, qgfbxjgs_ecg, qbxjgs_ecg, xbxjgs_ecg, xhbxjgs_ecg, hbxjgs_ecg, xcbbxjgs_ecg, gcbbxjgs_ecg, cbbxjgs_ecg, xnmxxjgs_ecg, ysxjgs_ecg, fsttgxxjgs_ecg, xjbxjgs_ecg, jbxjgs_ecg, yjx_ecg, jx_ecg, cjx_ecg, xdtwjz_ecg,
#{id}, #{recordDate}, #{age}, #{gender}, #{leadCount}, #{zcxdtEcg}, #{dxxlEcg}, #{ywxlEcg}, #{fxxlEcg}, #{sxxlEcg}, #{jjxxlEcg}, #{qbxlEcg}, #{sxxdgsEcg}, #{ssxxdgsEcg}, #{jjxxdgsEcg}, #{fxxdgsEcg}, #{fxybEcg}, #{fxzbEcg}, #{fxtbEcg}, #{sxybEcg}, #{sxzbEcg}, #{jjxybEcg}, #{jjxzbEcg}, #{jjxtbEcg}, #{dxtbEcg}, #{xstbEcg}, #{qxtbEcg}, #{xfcdEcg}, #{xfpdEcg}, #{xscdEcg}, #{xspdEcg}, #{ydfszdEcg}, #{edfszdEcg}, #{edixfszdEcg}, #{ediixfszdEcg}, #{sdfszdEcg}, #{dfzdEcg}, #{gdfszdEcg}, #{zqfzzdEcg}, #{zhfzzdEcg}, #{wqxzszzdEcg}, #{bwqxzszzdEcg}, #{wqxyszzdEcg}, #{bwqxyszzdEcg}, #{ftyxsnzdEcg}, #{sncyxcdEcg}, #{xsyjbEcg}, #{yjzhzEcg}, #{zxffdEcg}, #{zxsfdEcg}, #{yxffdEcg}, #{yxsfdEcg}, #{stgbEcg}, #{stTgbEcg}, #{tbycEcg}, #{qtjqycEcg}, #{qtcjqycEcg}, #{kjubEcg}, #{zqfjEcg}, #{qjbxjgsEcg}, #{qcbxjgsEcg}, #{qgfbxjgsEcg}, #{qbxjgsEcg}, #{xbxjgsEcg}, #{xhbxjgsEcg}, #{hbxjgsEcg}, #{xcbbxjgsEcg}, #{gcbbxjgsEcg}, #{cbbxjgsEcg}, #{xnmxxjgsEcg}, #{ysxjgsEcg}, #{fsttgxxjgsEcg}, #{xjbxjgsEcg}, #{jbxjgsEcg}, #{yjxEcg}, #{jxEcg}, #{cjxEcg}, #{xdtwjzEcg},

insert into ecg_count(id, record_date, age, gender, lead_count, zcxdt_ecg, dxxl_ecg, ywxl_ecg, fxxl_ecg, sxxl_ecg, jjxxl_ecg, qbxl_ecg, sxxdgs_ecg, ssxxdgs_ecg, jjxxdgs_ecg, fxxdgs_ecg, fxyb_ecg, fxzb_ecg, fxtb_ecg, sxyb_ecg, sxzb_ecg, jjxyb_ecg, jjxzb_ecg, jjxtb_ecg, dxtb_ecg, xstb_ecg, qxtb_ecg, xfcd_ecg, xfpd_ecg, xscd_ecg, xspd_ecg, ydfszd_ecg, edfszd_ecg, edIxfszd_ecg, edIIxfszd_ecg, sdfszd_ecg, dfzd_ecg, gdfszd_ecg, zqfzzd_ecg, zhfzzd_ecg, wqxzszzd_ecg, bwqxzszzd_ecg, wqxyszzd_ecg, bwqxyszzd_ecg, ftyxsnzd_ecg, sncyxcd_ecg, xsyjb_ecg, yjzhz_ecg, zxffd_ecg, zxsfd_ecg, yxffd_ecg, yxsfd_ecg, stgb_ecg, st_tgb_ecg, tbyc_ecg, qtjqyc_ecg, qtcjqyc_ecg, kjub_ecg, zqfj_ecg, qjbxjgs_ecg, qcbxjgs_ecg, qgfbxjgs_ecg, qbxjgs_ecg, xbxjgs_ecg, xhbxjgs_ecg, hbxjgs_ecg, xcbbxjgs_ecg, gcbbxjgs_ecg, cbbxjgs_ecg, xnmxxjgs_ecg, ysxjgs_ecg, fsttgxxjgs_ecg, xjbxjgs_ecg, jbxjgs_ecg, yjx_ecg, jx_ecg, cjx_ecg, xdtwjz_ecg) values
(#{ecg.id}, #{ecg.recordDate}, #{ecg.age}, #{ecg.gender}, #{ecg.leadCount}, #{ecg.zcxdtEcg}, #{ecg.dxxlEcg},#{ecg.ywxlEcg} ,#{ecg.fxxlEcg}, #{ecg.sxxlEcg}, #{ecg.jjxxlEcg}, #{ecg.qbxlEcg}, #{ecg.sxxdgsEcg}, #{ecg.ssxxdgsEcg}, #{ecg.jjxxdgsEcg}, #{ecg.fxxdgsEcg}, #{ecg.fxybEcg}, #{ecg.fxzbEcg},#{ecg.fxtbEcg} ,#{ecg.sxybEcg} , #{ecg.sxzbEcg},#{ecg.jjxybEcg} , #{ecg.jjxzbEcg} ,#{ecg.jjxtbEcg} , #{ecg.dxtbEcg} , #{ecg.xstbEcg} , #{ecg.qxtbEcg},#{ecg.xfcdEcg} ,#{ecg.xfpdEcg} ,#{ecg.xscdEcg} , #{ecg.xspdEcg}, #{ecg.ydfszdEcg}, #{ecg.edfszdEcg}, #{ecg.edixfszdEcg} , #{ecg.ediixfszdEcg},#{ecg.sdfszdEcg} ,#{ecg.dfzdEcg} , #{ecg.gdfszdEcg} , #{ecg.zqfzzdEcg},#{ecg.zhfzzdEcg} ,#{ecg.wqxzszzdEcg} ,#{ecg.bwqxzszzdEcg} ,#{ecg.wqxyszzdEcg}, #{ecg.bwqxyszzdEcg}, #{ecg.ftyxsnzdEcg}, #{ecg.sncyxcdEcg}, #{ecg.xsyjbEcg}, #{ecg.yjzhzEcg} ,#{ecg.zxffdEcg} , #{ecg.zxsfdEcg}, #{ecg.yxffdEcg}, #{ecg.yxsfdEcg}, #{ecg.stgbEcg},#{ecg.stTgbEcg} , #{ecg.tbycEcg}, #{ecg.qtjqycEcg},#{ecg.qtcjqycEcg} , #{ecg.kjubEcg}, #{ecg.zqfjEcg},#{ecg.qjbxjgsEcg} , #{ecg.qcbxjgsEcg}, #{ecg.qgfbxjgsEcg}, #{ecg.qbxjgsEcg}, #{ecg.xbxjgsEcg}, #{ecg.xhbxjgsEcg}, #{ecg.hbxjgsEcg}, #{ecg.xcbbxjgsEcg}, #{ecg.gcbbxjgsEcg}, #{ecg.cbbxjgsEcg}, #{ecg.xnmxxjgsEcg},#{ecg.ysxjgsEcg} ,#{ecg.fsttgxxjgsEcg} , #{ecg.xjbxjgsEcg}, #{ecg.qjbxjgsEcg}, #{ecg.yjxEcg}, #{ecg.jxEcg},#{ecg.cjxEcg} ,#{ecg.xdtwjzEcg} )
mapper.delete:
delete from ecg_count where id in
#{id}
mapper.select:
SELECT name,COUNT(*) AS value FROM ( SELECT age, CASE WHEN age BETWEEN 1 AND 10 THEN '1-10岁' WHEN age BETWEEN 11 AND 20 THEN '11-20岁' WHEN age BETWEEN 21 AND 25 THEN '21-25岁' WHEN age BETWEEN 26 AND 30 THEN '26-30岁' WHEN age BETWEEN 31 AND 35 THEN '31-35岁' WHEN age BETWEEN 36 AND 40 THEN '36-40岁' WHEN age BETWEEN 41 AND 45 THEN '41-45岁' WHEN age BETWEEN 46 AND 50 THEN '46-50岁' WHEN age BETWEEN 51 AND 55 THEN '51-55岁' WHEN age BETWEEN 56 AND 60 THEN '56-60岁' WHEN age BETWEEN 61 AND 65 THEN '61-65岁' WHEN age BETWEEN 66 AND 70 THEN '66-70岁' WHEN age BETWEEN 71 AND 75 THEN '71-75岁' WHEN age BETWEEN 76 AND 80 THEN '76-80岁' WHEN age BETWEEN 81 AND 85 THEN '81-85岁' WHEN age > 85 THEN '85岁以上' END AS name FROM ecg_count gender = '男' and zcxdt_ecg = 1 and zcxdt_ecg = 0 and dxxl_ecg = 1 and ywxl_ecg = 1 and fxxl_ecg = 1 and sxxl_ecg = 1 and jjxxl_ecg = 1 and qbxl_ecg = 1 and sxxdgs_ecg = 1 and ssxxdgs_ecg = 1 and jjxxdgs_ecg = 1 and fxxdgs_ecg = 1 and fxyb_ecg = 1 and fxzb_ecg = 1 and fxtb_ecg = 1 and sxyb_ecg = 1 and sxzb_ecg = 1 and jjxyb_ecg = 1 and jjxzb_ecg = 1 and jjxtb_ecg = 1 and dxtb_ecg = 1 and xstb_ecg = 1 and qxtb_ecg = 1 and xfcd_ecg = 1 and xfpd_ecg = 1 and xscd_ecg = 1 and xspd_ecg = 1 and ydfszd_ecg = 1 and edfszd_ecg = 1 and edIxfszd_ecg = 1 and edIIxfszd_ecg = 1 and sdfszd_ecg = 1 and dfzd_ecg = 1 and gdfszd_ecg = 1 and zqfzzd_ecg = 1 and zhfzzd_ecg = 1 and wqxzszzd_ecg = 1 and bwqxzszzd_ecg = 1 and wqxyszzd_ecg = 1 and bwqxyszzd_ecg = 1 and ftyxsnzd_ecg = 1 and sncyxcd_ecg = 1 and xsyjb_ecg = 1 and yjzhz_ecg = 1 and zxffd_ecg = 1 and zxsfd_ecg = 1 and yxffd_ecg = 1 and yxsfd_ecg = 1 and stgb_ecg = 1 and st_tgb_ecg = 1 and tbyc_ecg = 1 and qtjqyc_ecg = 1 and qtcjqyc_ecg = 1 and kjub_ecg = 1 and zqfj_ecg = 1 and qjbxjgs_ecg = 1 and qcbxjgs_ecg = 1 and qgfbxjgs_ecg = 1 and qbxjgs_ecg = 1 and xbxjgs_ecg = 1 and xhbxjgs_ecg = 1 and hbxjgs_ecg = 1 and xcbbxjgs_ecg = 1 and gcbbxjgs_ecg = 1 and cbbxjgs_ecg = 1 and xnmxxjgs_ecg = 1 and ysxjgs_ecg = 1 and fsttgxxjgs_ecg = 1 and xjbxjgs_ecg = 1 and jbxjgs_ecg =1 and yjx_ecg = 1 and jx_ecg = 1 and cjx_ecg = 1 and xdtwjz_ecg = 1
)AS u WHERE u.name is not null GROUP BY name ORDER BY name
SELECT #{type} as label , count(#{type}) as value FROM ecg_count WHERE #{type} = 1 GROUP BY #{type}

SELECT count(if(fxxl_ecg=1,true,null)) as fxxlEcg, count(if(dxxl_ecg=1,true,null)) as dxxlEcg, count(if(ywxl_ecg=1,true,null)) as ywxlEcg, count(if(sxxl_ecg=1,true,null)) as sxxlEcg, count(if(jjxxl_ecg=1,true,null)) as jjxxlEcg, count(if(qbxl_ecg=1,true,null)) as qbxlEcg, count(if(sxxdgs_ecg=1,true,null)) as sxxdgsEcg, count(if(xdtwjz_ecg=1,true,null)) as xdtwjzEcg, count(if(ssxxdgs_ecg=1,true,null)) as ssxxdgsEcg, count(if(jjxxdgs_ecg=1,true,null)) as jjxxdgsEcg, count(if(fxxdgs_ecg=1,true,null)) as fxxdgsEcg, count(if(jjxyb_ecg=1,true,null)) as jjxybEcg, count(if(fxzb_ecg=1,true,null)) as fxzbEcg, count(if(sxyb_ecg=1,true,null)) as sxybEcg, count(if(sxzb_ecg=1,true,null)) as sxzbEcg, count(if(fxtb_ecg=1,true,null)) as fxtbEcg, count(if(fxyb_ecg=1,true,null)) as fxybEcg, count(if(jjxzb_ecg=1,true,null)) as jjxzbEcg, count(if(jjxtb_ecg=1,true,null)) as jjxtbEcg, count(if(dxtb_ecg=1,true,null)) as dxtbEcg, count(if(xstb_ecg=1,true,null)) as xstbEcg, count(if(qxtb_ecg=1,true,null)) as qxtbEcg, count(if(xfcd_ecg=1,true,null)) as xfcdEcg, count(if(xfpd_ecg=1,true,null)) as xfpdEcg, count(if(xscd_ecg=1,true,null)) as xscdEcg, count(if(ydfszd_ecg=1,true,null)) as ydfszdEcg, count(if(xspd_ecg=1,true,null)) as xspdEcg, count(if(edfszd_ecg=1,true,null)) as edfszdEcg, count(if(edIxfszd_ecg=1,true,null)) as edIxfszdEcg, count(if(edIIxfszd_ecg=1,true,null)) as edIIxfszdEcg, count(if(sdfszd_ecg=1,true,null)) as sdfszdEcg, count(if(dfzd_ecg=1,true,null)) as dfzdEcg, count(if(gdfszd_ecg=1,true,null)) as gdfszdEcg, count(if(zqfzzd_ecg=1,true,null)) as zqfzzdEcg, count(if(zhfzzd_ecg=1,true,null)) as zhfzzdEcg, count(if(bwqxzszzd_ecg=1,true,null)) as bwqxzszzdEcg, count(if(wqxzszzd_ecg=1,true,null)) as wqxzszzdEcg, count(if(wqxyszzd_ecg=1,true,null)) as wqxyszzdEcg, count(if(bwqxyszzd_ecg=1,true,null)) as bwqxyszzdEcg, count(if(ftyxsnzd_ecg=1,true,null)) as ftyxsnzdEcg, count(if(sncyxcd_ecg=1,true,null)) as sncyxcdEcg, count(if(xsyjb_ecg=1,true,null)) as xsyjbEcg, count(if(yjzhz_ecg=1,true,null)) as yjzhzEcg, count(if(zxffd_ecg=1,true,null)) as zxffdEcg, count(if(yxffd_ecg=1,true,null)) as yxffdEcg, count(if(zxsfd_ecg=1,true,null)) as zxsfdEcg, count(if(yxsfd_ecg=1,true,null)) as yxsfdEcg, count(if(stgb_ecg=1,true,null)) as stgbEcg, count(if(st_tgb_ecg=1,true,null)) as stTgbEcg, count(if(tbyc_ecg=1,true,null)) as tbycEcg, count(if(qtjqyc_ecg=1,true,null)) as qtjqycEcg, count(if(qtcjqyc_ecg=1,true,null)) as qtcjqycEcg, count(if(kjub_ecg=1,true,null)) as kjubEcg, count(if(zqfj_ecg=1,true,null)) as zqfjEcg, count(if(qjbxjgs_ecg=1,true,null)) as qjbxjgsEcg, count(if(qcbxjgs_ecg=1,true,null)) as qcbxjgsEcg, count(if(qgfbxjgs_ecg=1,true,null)) as qgfbxjgsEcg, count(if(qbxjgs_ecg=1,true,null)) as qbxjgsEcg, count(if(xbxjgs_ecg=1,true,null)) as xbxjgsEcg, count(if(xhbxjgs_ecg=1,true,null)) as xhbxjgsEcg, count(if(hbxjgs_ecg=1,true,null)) as hbxjgsEcg, count(if(xcbbxjgs_ecg=1,true,null)) as xcbbxjgsEcg, count(if(gcbbxjgs_ecg=1,true,null)) as gcbbxjgsEcg, count(if(cbbxjgs_ecg=1,true,null)) as cbbxjgsEcg, count(if(xnmxxjgs_ecg=1,true,null)) as xnmxxjgsEcg, count(if(ysxjgs_ecg=1,true,null)) as ysxjgsEcg, count(if(fsttgxxjgs_ecg=1,true,null)) as fsttgxxjgsEcg, count(if(xjbxjgs_ecg=1,true,null)) as xjbxjgsEcg, count(if(jbxjgs_ecg=1,true,null)) as jbxjgsEcg, count(if(yjx_ecg=1,true,null)) as yjxEcg, count(if(jx_ecg=1,true,null)) as jxEcg, count(if(cjx_ecg=1,true,null)) as cjxEcg FROM ecg_count
SELECT zcxdt_ecg as name, COUNT(zcxdt_ecg) as value FROM ecg_count GROUP BY zcxdt_ecg ORDER BY zcxdt_ecg

SELECT age as name, COUNT(age) as value FROM ecg_count
age BETWEEN 0 AND 17 and zcxdt_ecg = 1 and zcxdt_ecg = 0 and dxxl_ecg = 1 and ywxl_ecg = 1 and fxxl_ecg = 1 and sxxl_ecg = 1 and jjxxl_ecg = 1 and qbxl_ecg = 1 and sxxdgs_ecg = 1 and ssxxdgs_ecg = 1 and jjxxdgs_ecg = 1 and fxxdgs_ecg = 1 and fxyb_ecg = 1 and fxzb_ecg = 1 and fxtb_ecg = 1 and sxyb_ecg = 1 and sxzb_ecg = 1 and jjxyb_ecg = 1 and jjxzb_ecg = 1 and jjxtb_ecg = 1 and dxtb_ecg = 1 and xstb_ecg = 1 and qxtb_ecg = 1 and xfcd_ecg = 1 and xfpd_ecg = 1 and xscd_ecg = 1 and xspd_ecg = 1 and ydfszd_ecg = 1 and edfszd_ecg = 1 and edIxfszd_ecg = 1 and edIIxfszd_ecg = 1 and sdfszd_ecg = 1 and dfzd_ecg = 1 and gdfszd_ecg = 1 and zqfzzd_ecg = 1 and zhfzzd_ecg = 1 and wqxzszzd_ecg = 1 and bwqxzszzd_ecg = 1 and wqxyszzd_ecg = 1 and bwqxyszzd_ecg = 1 and ftyxsnzd_ecg = 1 and sncyxcd_ecg = 1 and xsyjb_ecg = 1 and yjzhz_ecg = 1 and zxffd_ecg = 1 and zxsfd_ecg = 1 and yxffd_ecg = 1 and yxsfd_ecg = 1 and stgb_ecg = 1 and st_tgb_ecg = 1 and tbyc_ecg = 1 and qtjqyc_ecg = 1 and qtcjqyc_ecg = 1 and kjub_ecg = 1 and zqfj_ecg = 1 and qjbxjgs_ecg = 1 and qcbxjgs_ecg = 1 and qgfbxjgs_ecg = 1 and qbxjgs_ecg = 1 and xbxjgs_ecg = 1 and xhbxjgs_ecg = 1 and hbxjgs_ecg = 1 and xcbbxjgs_ecg = 1 and gcbbxjgs_ecg = 1 and cbbxjgs_ecg = 1 and xnmxxjgs_ecg = 1 and ysxjgs_ecg = 1 and fsttgxxjgs_ecg = 1 and xjbxjgs_ecg = 1 and jbxjgs_ecg =1 and yjx_ecg = 1 and jx_ecg = 1 and cjx_ecg = 1 and xdtwjz_ecg = 1
GROUP BY age

SELECT name,COUNT(*) AS value FROM ( SELECT age, CASE WHEN age BETWEEN 0 AND 10 THEN '0-10岁' WHEN age BETWEEN 11 AND 20 THEN '11-20岁' WHEN age BETWEEN 21 AND 25 THEN '21-25岁' WHEN age BETWEEN 26 AND 30 THEN '26-30岁' WHEN age BETWEEN 31 AND 35 THEN '31-35岁' WHEN age BETWEEN 36 AND 40 THEN '36-40岁' WHEN age BETWEEN 41 AND 45 THEN '41-45岁' WHEN age BETWEEN 46 AND 50 THEN '46-50岁' WHEN age BETWEEN 51 AND 55 THEN '51-55岁' WHEN age BETWEEN 56 AND 60 THEN '56-60岁' WHEN age BETWEEN 61 AND 65 THEN '61-65岁' WHEN age BETWEEN 66 AND 70 THEN '66-70岁' WHEN age BETWEEN 71 AND 75 THEN '71-75岁' WHEN age BETWEEN 76 AND 80 THEN '76-80岁' WHEN age BETWEEN 81 AND 85 THEN '81-85岁' WHEN age > 85 THEN '85岁以上' END AS name FROM ecg_count gender = '男' and zcxdt_ecg = 1 and zcxdt_ecg = 0 and dxxl_ecg = 1 and ywxl_ecg = 1 and fxxl_ecg = 1 and sxxl_ecg = 1 and jjxxl_ecg = 1 and qbxl_ecg = 1 and sxxdgs_ecg = 1 and ssxxdgs_ecg = 1 and jjxxdgs_ecg = 1 and fxxdgs_ecg = 1 and fxyb_ecg = 1 and fxzb_ecg = 1 and fxtb_ecg = 1 and sxyb_ecg = 1 and sxzb_ecg = 1 and jjxyb_ecg = 1 and jjxzb_ecg = 1 and jjxtb_ecg = 1 and dxtb_ecg = 1 and xstb_ecg = 1 and qxtb_ecg = 1 and xfcd_ecg = 1 and xfpd_ecg = 1 and xscd_ecg = 1 and xspd_ecg = 1 and ydfszd_ecg = 1 and edfszd_ecg = 1 and edIxfszd_ecg = 1 and edIIxfszd_ecg = 1 and sdfszd_ecg = 1 and dfzd_ecg = 1 and gdfszd_ecg = 1 and zqfzzd_ecg = 1 and zhfzzd_ecg = 1 and wqxzszzd_ecg = 1 and bwqxzszzd_ecg = 1 and wqxyszzd_ecg = 1 and bwqxyszzd_ecg = 1 and ftyxsnzd_ecg = 1 and sncyxcd_ecg = 1 and xsyjb_ecg = 1 and yjzhz_ecg = 1 and zxffd_ecg = 1 and zxsfd_ecg = 1 and yxffd_ecg = 1 and yxsfd_ecg = 1 and stgb_ecg = 1 and st_tgb_ecg = 1 and tbyc_ecg = 1 and qtjqyc_ecg = 1 and qtcjqyc_ecg = 1 and kjub_ecg = 1 and zqfj_ecg = 1 and qjbxjgs_ecg = 1 and qcbxjgs_ecg = 1 and qgfbxjgs_ecg = 1 and qbxjgs_ecg = 1 and xbxjgs_ecg = 1 and xhbxjgs_ecg = 1 and hbxjgs_ecg = 1 and xcbbxjgs_ecg = 1 and gcbbxjgs_ecg = 1 and cbbxjgs_ecg = 1 and xnmxxjgs_ecg = 1 and ysxjgs_ecg = 1 and fsttgxxjgs_ecg = 1 and xjbxjgs_ecg = 1 and jbxjgs_ecg =1 and yjx_ecg = 1 and jx_ecg = 1 and cjx_ecg = 1 and xdtwjz_ecg = 1
)AS u WHERE u.name is not null GROUP BY name ORDER BY name
